trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> Web server control.

The CheckBoxDesigner class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class to ensure that the control is displayed with a meaningful representation at design time.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of this class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property of the control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property is empty or consists only of white space, then the generated HTML contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the check box control; otherwise, the generated HTML contains the contents of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property.
Override this method to change the generated HTML.
The markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
